subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray advanced to the fourth round on Sunday at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Feliciano López, 6-4, 6-1.
snippet: Andy Murray advanced to the fourth round on Sunday at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Feliciano López, 6-4, 6-1.
